sn45.26:4.2: “Mendicants, I will teach you a bad person and a worse person,
sn45.26:4.3: good person and a better person.
sn45.26:4.5: And what is a bad person?
sn45.26:4.6: It’s someone who has wrong view, wrong motivation, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, and wrong samādhi.
sn45.26:4.8: This is called a bad person.
sn45.26:5.1: And what is a worse person?
sn45.26:5.2: It’s someone who has wrong view, wrong motivation, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, wrong samādhi, wrong knowledge, and wrong freedom.
sn45.26:6.1: And what is a good person?
sn45.26:6.2: It’s someone who has right view, right motivation, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right samādhi.
sn45.26:6.4: This is called a good person.
sn45.26:7.1: And what is a better person?
sn45.26:7.2: It’s someone who has right view, right motivation, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right samādhi, right knowledge, and right freedom.
